tool_description: Find your edge with the stock options strategy scanner.  Monitor stock options with your options chain endpoints.
name: FancyOptions
title: FancyOptions

api_list.name: Options Chain
api_list.description:
This endpoint returns the an options chain for a given ticker and expiration date.

Date format.  YYYY-MM-DD
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://fancyoptions.p.rapidapi.com/options/AAPL/expiration/2022-09-16"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fancyoptions.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://fancyoptions.p.rapidapi.com/options/{ticker}/expiration/{expiration}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fancyoptions.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Options Expirations
api_list.description: This endpoint returns the expirations for a given ticker.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://fancyoptions.p.rapidapi.com/options/expirations/AAPL"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fancyoptions.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://fancyoptions.p.rapidapi.com/options/expirations/{ticker}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fancyoptions.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Options Vertical
api_list.description: This endpoint returns verticals for an individual ticker. The verticals that are returned have a 70% chance of being out of the money at time of expirations.

api_list.name: S&P 500 Verticals
api_list.description: This endpoint returns the call and put spreads from the S&P 500 with the highest credits. The verticals that are returned have a 70% chance of being out of the money at time of expirations. This endpoint is updated hourly.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://fancyoptions.p.rapidapi.com/verticals"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fancyoptions.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
